Hero.title: Thoughts and explorations from a curious developer.
Hero.description-1: Hi I'm Hai. This is my blog. Here, I write about the things I'm passionate about.
Hero.description-2: Each piece I write aims to dive deep into the topics I'm passionate about, while also making complex topics more accessible through interactive playgrounds, visualization, and well detailed walkthroughs.
Hero.description-3: My goal is to give you the tools and intuition to explore further on your own.
